value:
$WmMPID_双界ミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|Festivals like this are full of such
unusual sights... What fun!$k$pHmm... What do you suppose
all those people gathered for?
Shall we go see for ourselves?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|The tournament is about to start,
Myrrh. We shouldn't dally.$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|Oh, right... What do you think, Saleh?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|If you wish it, Great Dragon, I see
nothing wrong with a little distraction
before reaching our destination.$k$pI am happy to accompany you.$k$p$WmMPID_双界ミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|Yay! Then, let's go. Are you coming
along, Nah?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|I guess...$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|Is something wrong?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|Well, to be honest, I do want to see
what's going on over there, same
as you.$k$pBut...I feel awkward saying what
I want sometimes...$k$pI think it's because I lived under
someone else's roof for so long...
I don't want to impose.$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|I see... Well, then, how about, for
today, you practice expressing what
it is that you want?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|P-practice?$k$p$nMPID_双界ミルラ|That's right. And you'll help too,
right, Saleh?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|I have no qualms, but...what does
practicing the expression of your
wants entail?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_双界ミルラ,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|All right. Now let's go see something
Nah is interested in. What would you
like to do, Nah?$k$p$nMPID_ンン|I... It's not easy to just come up with
something when asked so suddenly!
Hang on... Ummm...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ンン,ch08_09_Myrrh_FF_Pair,Face|Let's see... Next thing, next thing...
Oh! I'm...hungry? Let's get something
to eat!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭サレフ,ch08_24_Salef_M_SpringFes21,Face|Looks like there is a food stall over
there. Shall we head that direction?$k$p$Sbs150|
